original_title: Mike Reid: The Guv'nors Last Stand
overview: Everyone s favourite East End geezer Mike Frank Butcher Reid comes to DVD with two brand new live stand-up shows, one of which is his last ever stand-up show before his untimely death last year. Reids career as a stand up spans nearly 40 years from when he got his first stand up break on ITV s hit show The Comedians in the 1970s alongside the likes of Bernard Manning, Frank Carson, Jim Bowen and Charlie Williams.
title: Mike Reid: The Guv'nors Last Stand
